Package DB

Class DBAppointment

java.lang.Object
DB.DBAppointment
public class DBAppointment extends Object
This class is used as an interface between Appointment objects and the database.
Author:
Aaron Wolf

    • validate_new_appointment

      public static boolean validate_new_appointment(int cid, LocalDateTime start, LocalDateTime end)
      Checks to make sure a new appointment does not conflict with already scheduled appointments for a given customer.
      Parameters:
      cid - An integer ID associated with a customer.
      start - A LocalDateTime associated with the start date and time of a new appointment.
      end - A LocalDateTime associated with the end date and time a new appointment.
      Returns:
      Returns ture if a conflicting appointment if found.

    • save

      public static int save(String title, String descrip, String location, String type, LocalDateTime start, LocalDateTime end, int customer_id, int contact_id)
      Saves a new appointment into the database.
      Parameters:
      title - The title of a new appointment.
      descrip - The description of a new appointment.
      location - The location of a new appointment.
      type - The type of a new appointment.
      start - The start date and time associated with a new appointment.
      end - The end date and time associated with a new appointment.
      customer_id - The customer ID associated with a new appointment.
      contact_id - The contact ID associated with a new appointemnt.
      Returns:
      Returns a integer representing the ID of a saved appointment.

    • validate_update_appointment

      public static boolean validate_update_appointment(int customer_id, int id, LocalDateTime start, LocalDateTime end)
      Checks to make sure and updated appointment does not conflict with other appointment associated with a customer.
      Parameters:
      customer_id - The ID of a customer assocaited with a customer.
      id - The ID of the appointment to be updates.
      start - The start date and time of the updated appointment.
      end - The end date and time of the updated appointment.
      Returns:
      Returns true if there is a conflicting appointment if found.

    • update

      public static void update(int id, String title, String descrip, String location, String type, LocalDateTime start, LocalDateTime end, int customer_id, int contact_id)
      Saves and updated appointment to the database.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of an appointment to be updated.
      title - The title of the appointment.
      descrip - The description of the appointment.
      location - The location of the appointment.
      type - The type of the appointment.
      start - The start date and time of the appointment.
      end - The end date and time of the appointment.
      customer_id - The ID of a customer associated with an appointment.
      contact_id - The ID of a contact associated with an appointment.
